name: delicieus
description: A food website built using Bootstrap, HTML, and Sass. Mainly focused on layout and carousel practice to create responsive food-related designs.

name: doob
description: A simple portfolio project built with CSS and HTML, and hosted on GitHub to practice using Git and GitHub effectively.

name: Yummy
description: My first project using JavaScript. Created with HTML, Sass, and JS to handle carousels and dynamic recipe interactions.

name: array
description: Developed using CSS, HTML, and GitHub to practice team collaboration and organize code with version control.

name: design
description: My second project with JavaScript, similar to Yummy. Built with HTML, JS, and Sass to enhance interactive section designs and JS skills.

name: loopstudios
description: Built entirely with HTML and Sass to practice full-page structuring and optimize clean design layouts.

name: moderna
description: Created with HTML, SCSS, and Bootstrap as a group project. Used GitHub for collaboration and version management.

name: siimple
description: Built with HTML and CSS to practice creating fully responsive websites without any external frameworks.

name: sneakers
description: A clean sneakers website project built with HTML and Sass, focusing on responsive and minimalistic design.

name: tastbite
description: My first project built with React, tailwind focusing on learning React components and their structure without using pure HTML and CSS.
